typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		year as short,
		{ month} as short,
		carrier as string,
		carrier_name as string,
		airport as string,
		airport_name as string,
		arr_flights as double,
		arr_del15 as double,
		carrier_ct as double,
		{ weather_ct} as double,
		nas_ct as double,
		security_ct as double,
		late_aircraft_ct as double,
		arr_cancelled as double,
		arr_diverted as double,
		{ arr_delay} as double,
		{ carrier_delay} as double,
		weather_delay as double,
		nas_delay as double,
		security_delay as double,
		late_aircraft_delay as double,
		{_c21} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(partitionbydate = concat(toString(year), toString({ month}))) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		partitionbydate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
